Enjoy live music, thrilling performances, and special events that add an extra layer of excitement to your visit. Our vibrant and dynamic atmosphere ensures that there’s always something happening to keep you entertained. How to Play at HotelCash Casino Ready to dive into the excitement of HotelCash Casino? pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Palacio de HotelCash About Our rooms Our playing place To book Privacy Policy Welcome to HotelCash! Your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and this Privacy Policy details how we handle, use, and safeguard your personal information. 1. Information Collection: - We collect various types of personal data, such as your name, email address, and contact number, when you interact with our services, such as making a purchase or signing up for promotions. - Additionally, we automatically gather non-personal information like IP addresses, browser types, and device identifiers to enhance our website's functionality and user experience. 2. Use of Information: - Your personal data is primarily used to process orders, provide customer support, and communicate with you about our products and services. - Non-personal information is utilized for analytical purposes, such as tracking website traffic patterns and improving our marketing strategies. 3. Information Sharing: - We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services and improving customer experience. 4. Data Security: - We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. 5. Your Choices: - You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information stored in our systems. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. 6. Policy Updates: - We reserve the right to revise or amend this Privacy Policy as needed. Any changes will be promptly communicated to you through our website or other appropriate channels. For any inquiries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at hotelcash@gmail.com. Thank you for entrusting HotelCash with your privacy and choosing us for your pet care needs! pages.rooms: Explore Our Luxurious Accommodations | HotelCash About Our rooms Our playing place To book Welcome to Our Luxurious Rooms Step into a realm of unparalleled comfort and sophistication at HotelCash. Our luxurious rooms are meticulously designed to provide you with the ultimate retreat during your stay. Whether you're seeking a peaceful haven for relaxation or a lavish setting for indulgence, our accommodations offer the perfect blend of style, comfort, and convenience. To book Our Exclusive Room Selection Enchanted Oasis Suite Immerse yourself in the tranquility of our Enchanted Oasis Suite, where luxury meets serenity. This extraordinary retreat boasts a private garden oasis, complete with lush greenery and a soothing waterfall, creating a magical ambiance that will transport you to a world of relaxation. Indulge in the ultimate escape as you unwind in the elegant living space or rejuvenate in the oversized soaking tub. Every detail of this enchanting suite is designed to enchant the senses and provide an unforgettable stay. Private garden oasis with a waterfall King-sized bed with premium bedding Oversized soaking tub Skyline Serenity Loft Elevate your stay to new heights in our Skyline Serenity Loft, where luxury and panoramic views collide. Perched high above the city skyline, this stunning loft offers a one-of-a-kind experience with floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase breathtaking vistas of the urban landscape. Relax in style in the contemporary living space or unwind on the private balcony as you soak in the mesmerizing sights below. With its modern design and unparalleled views, the Skyline Serenity Loft is sure to leave a lasting impression. Private balcony Sleek bathroom with rainfall shower Complimentary minibar Secret Garden Hideaway Escape to a hidden oasis in our Secret Garden Hideaway, a secluded retreat nestled within the heart of the hotel. Tucked away behind a lush curtain of foliage, this enchanting suite offers a sense of serenity and seclusion unlike any other. Step inside to discover a tranquil haven adorned with botanical accents and natural textures, creating a peaceful ambiance that invites relaxation. Unwind in the cozy sleeping nook or enjoy a leisurely soak in the freestanding bathtub, surrounded by verdant greenery. With its intimate atmosphere and secluded setting, the Secret Garden Hideaway offers a truly magical retreat for discerning travelers. Private garden terrace Freestanding bathtub Complimentary coffee and tea station Galactic Explorer Suite Embark on an otherworldly adventure in our Galactic Explorer Suite, a futuristic retreat designed for intrepid travelers. Inspired by the mysteries of the cosmos, this cutting-edge suite features sleek metallic accents, futuristic furnishings, and celestial motifs that evoke the spirit of space exploration. Immerse yourself in the immersive experience as you lounge in the zero-gravity seating area or stargaze from the private observatory deck. With its innovative design and interstellar amenities, the Galactic Explorer Suite offers a truly unforgettable journey beyond the stars. Private observatory deck with telescope Zero-gravity seating area High-tech entertainment system with virtual reality console To BOOK Room Cleaning and Housekeeping Services At HotelCash, we pride ourselves on providing meticulous room cleaning and housekeeping services to ensure that every guest enjoys a comfortable and pristine stay. Our dedicated team of housekeepers is committed to upholding the highest standards of cleanliness and hospitality, attending to every detail with precision and care. Impeccable Cleanliness: Our housekeeping staff undergo rigorous training to deliver impeccable cleanliness in every room. From sanitizing surfaces to changing linens, we leave no corner untouched, ensuring that each space is immaculate and inviting for our guests. Attention to Detail: We understand that the little details can make a big difference in the guest experience. That's why our housekeeping team pays close attention to detail, from arranging amenities to ensuring that every item is in its rightful place, creating a welcoming environment that exceeds expectations. Prompt and Efficient Service: With our efficient housekeeping service, guests can rest assured that their needs will be promptly attended to. Whether it's a request for extra towels or a special accommodation, our staff is dedicated to providing swift and courteous assistance to enhance the comfort and satisfaction of our guests. Personalized Care: At HotelCash, we believe in providing personalized care tailored to the unique preferences of each guest. Our housekeeping staff is trained to accommodate special requests and preferences, ensuring that every stay is tailored to the individual needs and preferences of our valued guests. Commitment to Excellence: Above all, our commitment to excellence drives everything we do. From the moment you step into your room to the time of your departure, our goal is to provide a seamless and memorable experience that leaves you feeling pampered, refreshed, and eager to return. Experience the Difference: Discover the difference of staying at HotelCash, where exceptional cleanliness, attention to detail, and personalized service combine to create an unparalleled guest experience. Relax and enjoy your stay, knowing that our dedicated housekeeping team is here to ensure that every moment of your visit is flawless and memorable. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Palacio de HotelCash About Our rooms Our playing place To book Terms and Conditions Welcome to HotelCash. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our website and services. 1. General 1.1. These terms and conditions govern your use of the HotelCash website and any services provided by HotelCash. 1.2. By using our website, you confirm that you accept these terms and conditions and agree to comply with them. 2. Booking and Reservations 2.1. All bookings made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. 2.2. HotelCash reserves the right to cancel or modify bookings at our discretion. In such cases, we will notify you promptly and offer alternative arrangements or a full refund. 2.3. Cancellation policies may vary depending on the rate or room type selected. Please refer to the specific terms provided during the booking process. 3. Payment 3.1. Payments for bookings are required at the time of reservation unless otherwise specified. 3.2. We accept various payment methods, including credit cards and other electronic payment systems. All transactions are processed securely. 3.3. Any additional charges incurred during your stay (e.g., room service, minibar, etc.) must be settled upon check-out. 4. Use of the Website 4.1. You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website. 4.2. You must not use our website in any way that is unlawful, fraudulent, or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, fraudulent, or harmful purpose or activity. 5. Intellectual Property 5.1. All content, trademarks, and data on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, and software, are the property of HotelCash or its content suppliers and are protected by international copyright laws. 5.2. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content without our prior written consent.
